text:
="preserve">François-Mathurin Gourvès (17 June 1929 – 12 August 2020) was a French Roman Catholic bishop. He was Bishop of Vannes from 1991 to 2005, and was Bishop Emeritus from 2005 to 2020. He was born in Plougastel-Daoulas, France.
Gourvès died on 12 August 2020 in Saint-Anne-d'Auray, France at the age of 91.
